item.description:
Let's meet at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub for the second regular season game. This is the Bears home opener. Hopefully the Bears give the Steelers a loss, so come on out and cheer on your Bears!

About the Courtside Restaurant and Pub

Courtside Restaurant and Pub have 12 HD TV's and they have the NFL SUNDAY TICKET. They seat over
200 people. The kitchen is closed on Sunday, but they provide free meetballs and sausages.

http://www.courtsidek...

Menu:
http://www.courtsidek...

Directions:
Courtside Restaurant and Pub is located 2 blocks from Leachmere T Station.
They also have free parking in their lot.

http://www.courtsidek...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign,

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Week 2 Football: Bears vs. Steelers
